definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-illusion_block,tag=lotw-illusion_block_grass] run playsound minecraft:entity.illusioner.cast_spell ambient @a[distance=..100] ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0 0.025</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-illusion_block,tag=lotw-illusion_block_grass] run particle minecraft:firework ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.1 3 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-illusion_block,tag=lotw-illusion_block_grass] run fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ air replace lantern_of_the_woodlands:illusion_grass</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-illusion_block,tag=lotw-illusion_block_grass]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
